entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the person in charge of discipline at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as someone who might catch Harry and his friends if they get caught.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as being loud and speaking out of turn.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as being sharp and telling Ron to shut up.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is one of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as being asleep on the floor and having trouble remembering his password.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is Filch's cat. She is mentioned as making a snuffling noise.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is the Hogwarts nurse. She is mentioned as having mended Neville's arm in a minute.

entities.name: the fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is the person who guards the entrance to Gryffindor Tower. She is mentioned as being gone somewhere.

entities.name: neville's password
entities.description: Neville's password is 'Pig snout'. It is mentioned as not helping him get into bed.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about getting caught by Filch.
Neville has been treated by Madam Pomfrey for his arm.
